7. Galamb Borong

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 5

8. Fém

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 5

9. Vertige

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 5

10. Der Zauberlehrling

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5

11. En suspens

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

L’Arrache-cœur

L’Arrache-cœur was originally intended as the eleventh étude, but was omitted by Ligeti in favour of En suspens. L’Arrache-cœur is yet to be published by Schott, Ligeti’s publisher.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3

12. Entrelacs

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 5

13. L’Escalier du diable

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 5

14. Columna infinită

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 5

14a. Coloana fără sfârşit

Coloana fără sfârşit is an earlier version of Columna infinită written for piano or player piano.

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 5
